ComicInfo.Summary: Deceit, treachery, double-crossing, the quest for popularity - it's like a little piece of Hollywood was dropped into the sacrificial circle of the cannibal cult! Our heroes learn that some of the dead are still breathing and what they believed about each other is all wrong. Meanwhile, the cannibals' real plan becomes clear...
